p: On the other hand, allowing the THI of ligands unstable Z- 1 in cage Pd 2(unstable Z- 1) 4 to take place by leaving the solution at room temperature for 5 d did not lead to the formation of Pd 2(stable Z- 1) 4, but to disassembly of the cage and formation of ill-defined complexes. Precipitation of the metal centers in these complexes identified the ligands as a mixture of both stable Z- 1 and stable E- 1 (originating from the PSS mixture), indicating that the THI does take place. A possible explanation could be that the mixture of stable Z- 1 and stable E- 1 does not form separate well-defined cage structures, but forms mixed complexes.
